removeInventoryHelper(int, int, int, int) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc.cucumber.InventoryStepDefs
The CoffeeMaker has no (direct) way to remove ingredients from the Inventory it stores, this allows us to effectively do so by creating a recipe with the amount of ingredients to remove, and then making coffee with the Recipe just created
removeInventoryHelper(int, int, int, int) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc.cucumber.MakeCoffeeStepDefs
The CoffeeMaker has no (direct) way to remove ingredients from the Inventory it stores, this allows us to effectively do so by creating a recipe with the amount of ingredients to remove, and then making coffee with the Recipe just created
